The Lord of the Rings 1977 Calendar

{{book | title=1978 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar | image = 1978 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar.jpg | illustrator=[[The Brothers Hildebrandt]] | editor= | publisher=[[Ballantine Books]] (UK) | date=[[1977]] | format=Stapled calendar with mailer (13 x 121⁄4 inches) | pages= | isbn=345-25689-1-595 | precededby=[[1977 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar]] | followedby=None. Next calendar:
[[The 1980 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar]] }} '''''1978 J.R.R. Tolkien Calendar''''' was the official Tolkien calendar published by [[Ballantine Books]] in [[1977]]. It features art by [[The Brothers Hildebrandt]] based on ''[[The Hobbit]]'' and ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''. ==Illustrations== * Cover - "[[:File:The Brothers Hildebrandt - Gimli and Legolas.jpg|Gimli and Legolas]]" * January - "[[:File:The Brothers Hildebrandt - Farmer Maggot's Hospitality.jpg|Farmer Maggot's Hospitality]]" * February - "[[:File:The Brothers Hildebrandt - Old Man Willow.jpg|Old Man Willow]]" * March - "[[:File:The Brothers Hildebrandt - The Gift of Galadriel.jpg|The Gift of Galadriel]]" * April - "[[:File:The Brothers Hildebrandt - The Pillars of the Kings.jpg|The Pillars of the Kings]]" * May - "[[:File:The Brothers Hildebrandt - Gollum.jpg|Gollum]]" * June - "[[:File:The Brothers Hildebrandt - The Return of Gandalf.jpg|The Return of Gandalf]]" * Centrefold - "[[:File:The Brothers Hildebrandt - At the Grey Havens.jpg|At the Grey Havens]]" * July - "[[:File:The Brothers Hildebrandt - Saruman and the Palantir.jpg|Saruman and the Palantir]]" * August - "[[:File:The Brothers Hildebrandt - The Golden Hall of Rohan.jpg|The Golden Hall of Rohan]]" * September - "[[:File:The Brothers Hildebrandt - Beorn the Beserker.jpg|Beorn the Berserker]]" * October - "[[:File:The Brothers Hildebrandt - King Theoden and Wormtongue.jpg|King Theoden and Wormtongue]]" * November - "[[:File:The Brothers Hildebrandt - Shelob.jpg|Shelob]]" * December - "[[:File:The Brothers Hildebrandt - The Dark Tower.png|The Dark Tower]]" ==See also== * ''[[The Silmarillion Calendar 1978]]'', published in the UK ==External links== * [https://web.archive.org/web/20250814114446/http://www.tolkiencalendars.com/BAL1978.html 1978 Ballantine Books] at [https://web.archive.org/web/20250324040418/https://www.tolkiencalendars.com/ The Compleat Gyde to Tolkien Calendars] {{Tolkiencalendars}} {{Title|italics}} [[Category:Official calendars|1978]]
